website_summaries.verdict: This impressive little machine comes with everything you need to get up and running straight out of the box.
pros: SUNGOLDPOWER's 50 A plasma cutter is priced considerably less than comparable models from other manufacturers
It comes with an inverter soft switch, hose clamp, and other needed supplies
cons: There are some issues with quality control
Faulty units have been shipped on rare occasions

customer_reviews.title: Work well.  Hope it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first paslma cutter. Here are some thing I discovered that might help you. 1. You have to tap the metal to get the cut to start. It should just take a tap of the tip to the metal you want to cut. 2. If your plasmas cutter doesn't start cutting try turning down your air pressure. Around 40psi worked for me. 3. Make sure that the white cap on the gun is tight. My cap was loose at first and it cut terribly. Once I tightened the cap it started cutting much faster and much cleaner. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprise!!
customer_reviews.text: This little bugger actually works as advertised. I am a beginner at all of this and other than having a VERY unsteady hand figured this out pretty quick. Does 1/2in deep cuts that i may or may not have to hit momentarily in a few spots to release completely. Really impressed with this little machine! (Cheap idea for a cutting surface for this as well is corrugated steel roofing/siding. I cut and tacked together 2 pieces to keep damage to any other surfaces to Zero) (really chews up concrete as well HAHA!!)
customer_reviews.author: @drenal_in_jnke

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Works great for price. Cuts clean. Comes with everything and adapter plug that goes from 220 to 110. 220 works better on thicker metals.
customer_reviews.author: davidsmith8783

customer_reviews.title: Quite Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed. Will do thinner material okay with 115 volt but it really shines at 230 volt. I've easily cut material 1/2" + with 230 volt. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Samich

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I'm a hobbyist so I don't use this item a lot... when I unboxed it I used it for about 8 minutes and it worked intermittently. I thought it was my fault so I waited until I got someone better acquainted with these kinds of tools to have a look and it worked for about fifteen minutes. When I tried a month later... it doesn't work at all. Won't arc. Now the return window is closed and I'm stuck with a dud. Jokes on me.
customer_reviews.author: CeCe

customer_reviews.title: Works great for smaller cuts
customer_reviews.text: OK for the money as long as you’re not cutting anything too thick
customer_reviews.author: richard trammell

customer_reviews.title: An amazing machine
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at the purchase of this item due to the cost..... HOWEVER.... wow was unimpressed. All items are here to get cutting and the precision that this machine cuts with is amazing. I’m currently making a new flat bed for one of my trucks and this is incredibly helpful. I cut 45deg angles with an aluminum square And it flys through. Amazing. Totally worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: made 4 cuts and it died
customer_reviews.text: 4 cuts on 1/8 steel 2" wide. The unit went pop. Return it and bought Lotos LTP5000D it blew everything away. Much better unit
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Bibb

customer_reviews.title: This little thing will cut!!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is baaaad! I bought it to cut a flat bed semi-trailer down for a bridge. I wasn’t sure how well it would work, but hey, for less than $300, I’ll take a chance. Once I got used to it, I had no problem cutting up to 1/2 inch steel on the trailer. See the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy great price
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I didn't get to use it alot. But the three times I did, it worked awesome.
customer_reviews.author: James L Border jr

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I was Sent this piece of crap a while back and when i opened the box I found missing parts and a product that was already used. Sinse my shop was closed it was past the 30 days when I opened it, I bought the fitttings to make it work. But it does't work. I know it is a cheap price, but i didn't expect this I have over 30 years experience welding and have owned and operated a few plasma cutters in that time. This is why I say buyer beware. There is no number to call if you have trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Customer J

customer_reviews.title: worked well
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping does a good job best results on 230 volts
customer_reviews.author: jack bird

customer_reviews.title: Works well for what I am doing
customer_reviews.text: Took a little tinkering with settings but once I found a good spot it is cutting 1/8 steel easily with 120v power. I'm using a small compressor but it is still working fine for the small cuts I am making- I believe it's a 5 gallon compressor.
customer_reviews.author: mdesh

customer_reviews.title: This little machine is great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine thinking for the price it would be mediocre at best but was quite surprised by it, I had no problem setting it up even though the instructions were vague at best but boy did this little guy cut. It takes a little getting used as in different metal thicknesses for matching speed with cutting but a little practice and you get there. I will say it works better using 220 vs 110 but that again depends on metal thickness, 110 is good if you have a 30 amp breaker installed. Is it worth the money? Absolutely .
customer_reviews.author: Rock Star

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it thinking it was a good deal. When it arrived I unboxed it, the gauge was broken. No directions for assembly so I YouTubed it. Once together, plugged it thinking I was going to have some fun.....well it didn’t work ☹️ Oh, made in China by the way. I boxed it back up and took it to UPS with in 2 1/2 hours for return. I can’t call it junk because I never got to use it.
customer_reviews.author: doris

customer_reviews.title: IGBT CUT50 review
customer_reviews.text: Needed to double clamp all air hose connections, but no other issues with set-up. It will cut through 1/2 inch steel with some effort. Makes great cuts through 1/4 inch steel.
customer_reviews.author: david boles

customer_reviews.title: Awsome plasma cutter sungoldpower 50a
customer_reviews.text: The plasma cutter work awsome no problems at all did what it supposed to do i recommend this plasma cutter
customer_reviews.author: JImmy garza

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Cuts 1/4 6061 aluminum to 10 gauge 1/4 inch steel. Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Need a very steady hand. Pretty good for only running 110v. Sometimes you will need to increase the pressure to get it started.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Marrero

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works well for painted and rusty surfaces. Not pilot arc, does need a relatively clear surface to start, but burns well after. Use 220 if possible, pulls heavy on 110
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Mahaffey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Item is easy to use. Hope it lasts. Found cheaper on other websites.
customer_reviews.author: J R G

customer_reviews.title: very nice plasma cutter
customer_reviews.text: if you use a plasma cutter as infrequent as i do you can't spend $800.00 on one so this is a very good alternative works great
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Don’t make the same mistake
customer_reviews.text: Regulator leaks right out of the box. Internal failure before it ever cut anything (just during set up) Absolute garbage. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: M265

customer_reviews.title: Performs excellent
customer_reviews.text: This item is above and beyond what I expected. I use it all the time
customer_reviews.author: Jeff allyn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Tested it up to 3/8" and it cut like butter. Got to work on my technique and the settings, but overall worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Anderson

customer_reviews.title: the gun quit working
customer_reviews.text: Ok well it looks good and sounds good i only had it a few days it stopped working have not been able to call yet will post if they fix the problem
customer_reviews.author: amanda secrest

customer_reviews.title: Always check your package for missing or damaged parts.
customer_reviews.text: The product looked pretty good but was missing parts. Wasn't able to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for body work now I just need to work on holding my hand steady
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: This little booger has done a great job so far!
customer_reviews.author: michael hill

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable value.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this little cutter for just over 2 years now and it has been nothing short of amazing. It never misses a beat. I use it in my ranch shop for a myriad of cutting chores. When I bought it, I figured it if made it through one big project it would be worth the money but here it is 2 years and multiple jobs later still working like new. Neighbor has a $4500 hypertherm that will cut slightly thicker steel but as far as general performance you can't tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: doby86

customer_reviews.title: Good machine and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Just got it a few weeks ago and so far so good.Very happy with this product . I have only used it on 220v but I’ve been zipping through 3/16” steel like butter, 1/4” with little to no issue, and managed to cut a piece of 3/4” with relative ease! To be honest for the price you can’t beat it, and the performance I can’t complain one bit, the customer service and warranty unbelievable and outstanding, you guys are awesome I’m gonna buy more of your guys product when the opportunity arises when I need machine
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a fabricator
customer_reviews.text: Let me start out saying that I am an at home hobbyist mechanic/fabricator in my spare time. I’ve only used it a few times, but am very happy with it so far. No problems cutting 1/4 plate and angle, leaves smooth clean cuts comparable to the miller unit where i work. Would definitely recommend this product.Excellent quality for a little guy, works great. I would like to add that after 6 months of use, this machine still performs 100% does everything it did just as well as day one. i would still 100% recommend this plasma cutter to anyone who is looking for a solid performing unit for a personal shop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great plasma cutter
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for months and it is a quality unit. I normally buy only name brand, but I decided to take a chance on this and I have been surprised at how well it works. Cuts 3/8 steel without a problem. Until you get up around 1/2", it's like the metal isn't even there. At 1/2" you just have to go a bit slower and keep your hand steady, but it will go right through.Overall,this plasma cutter is what you are looking for, I have used many different types over the years and this 1 is perfect.It's performance for the price is unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: linowu

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time to use this machine and it works great.I bought this to cut and repair a Jeep Wrangler frame , I haven’t had to cut more than 1/2” but it does that just fine. I have cut plenty of 1/8 and it cuts quickly and cleanly i was impressed.Definitely happy was my first attempt and I think it's only going to get better. The power is there just gotta hone my technique. Really easy to use and cuts nice and clean. Well worth the money. I will tell my friend about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SUNGOLDPOWER 50A Air Plasma Cutter Inverter DC Digital Display IGBT Portable CUT50 Welding Portable Machine Cutting 50Amp Dual Voltage 110V and 220V
feature_bullets: 1.IGBT Technology:IGBT machine is far superior and more stable than MOSFET machine, Adopting the most advanced inverter IGBT technology and the development of inverter air plasma cutter
2. Dual Voltage: Automatic Dual Voltage / Dual Frequency allows the machine to run directly on 220 V 50/60 Hz power, or on 110 V 50/60 Hz,plug adapters included

3. LCD Display: digital LCD display,easy read front panel air-pressure gauge, adjustable cutting current to satisfy the cutting demands based on different kinds of material and thickness of working plate

4. Performance: 10-50AC output, 1/2” ideal clean cut and 3/4” maximum,Suitable for cutting Stainless steel,copper, iron , aluminum and other metal Materials.Uses non-hazardous compressed air to cut, safe and at low cost.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars74 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
